name: Check Retro Styling
description: Verify UI components follow retro design guidelines
prompt:
Review the saved component file and check if it follows the retro design guidelines:
- No rounded corners (borderRadius should be 0)
- Thick borders (2-4px)
- Uses theme colors only
- Uppercase text for buttons
- Follows 8px grid spacing

If any violations are found, suggest fixes. If everything looks good, confirm compliance.
